summary: During the housing shortage of the Summer Olympic Games in 1964, two men and a woman share a small apartment in Tokyo, and the older man soon starts playing Cupid to the younger pair.
cast: Cary Grant|Samantha Eggar|Jim Hutton|John Standing|Miiko Taka|Ted Hartley|Ben Astar|George Takei|Teru Shimada|Lois Kiuchi|Holger Abro|Isabel Boniface|Vickey Cason|Alan Chee|David Draper|Sonja Haney|Sonya Harrison|Andre Hemmers|Susan Ikeda|Dale Ishimoto|Miyoshi Jingu|Clifford Kawada|June Kawai|Lei Kim|Robert Kino|Yangi Kitadani|Frank Kumagai|George Matsui|Craig Matsunaga|Miko Mayama|Irene Mizushima|Rollin Moriyama|Mori Moto|Susan Moudy|Noriko|Monty O'Grady|Roy K. Ogata|Bob Okazaki|Randy Okazaki|Leonidas Ossetynski|Ken Parker|Gail Peters|Mel Profit|Peggy Rea|Jack Rigney|Alex Rodine|Bill Saito|Bert Santos|Kay Shimatsu|Lukas Shimatsu|Anna Shin|Patty Siu|Roy Taguchi|Yuki Tani|Jane Tochihara|Jodee Tochihara|Wendee Tochihara|Ilona Wilson|James Yagi|Sheri Yamasaki|C.K. title: Apartamento para tres
